about_the_game:
This is a checked game based on VR technology. Players can enter the game scenario in the realm and control the chess pieces through the handle. This is a single player checked for challenging and a intellectual test for smart people.

The rules of the game are simple and easy to understand, but players need a certain ability to chess and think.

Explanation of gameplay:

In the game, you will play a smart giant, enjoy your leisure time in your castle manor.
In the game scene, players will see a chessboard and some chess pieces. It is a well -shaped plate from thirty -three plaids, starting with a space in the middle, jumping the chess pieces over the other nearby chess pieces, and the crossed chess pieces will be eaten.
Pusts can move the front, back, left, and right, but not to move the angle.
When there is only one chess piece left on the player's chessboard, the game ends. Players win.



In order to allow beginners to appreciate the charm of single play. Compared with the rules of the general chess game, we provide more intuitive video display, and to show the position that can be moved to each mobile chess piece in the game.



The less the steps are used, the fewer chess pieces in the chessboard, the more it shows that you are smart.
In addition to the conventional chess game, we also provide some basic levels for beginners, you can improve your logical thinking ability in the level.

Game operation：

Right handle trigger key click to control the chess pieces movement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
